explanation:
code_hardening: Added a null check for the input Class, ensured constructor accessibility is handled safely using canAccess with proper restoration in a finally block, and limited method inspection to declared methods only.
resolve_compilation_errors: Changed visibility to private static to match helper intent while remaining callable by in-class tests, and kept the signature compatible with existing callers.
exception_handling: Broadened the throws clause to a single Exception, covering all reflection-related failures without listing specific types.
logic_customization: Preserved core validations (final class, single private no-arg constructor, reflective invocation, static-only methods) while simplifying loops and conditions and using getDeclaredMethods for precise checks.
refactoring: Removed unnecessary final modifiers, streamlined variable usage, and updated assertion messages for clearer wording and capitalization.
misc: Reformatted code for consistency and conciseness; no new custom API calls were introduced.
